_comment: This file is used to simplify development on a particular machine
To use it you would take this file, rename it to devpaths.json
then fill in the username, and host for the username and host
that correspond with the development work that is being done
the usercustomize will detect this file and rearrage the python
paths so that they use, the development directory specified
use unix path delimiters when specifying paths, ie '/'
